The game is not bad, however to community is generally really bad. There a surivivors that will always complain about camping yet the killer just spots your teammate hiding in the corner. This leads to toxicity that plagues this game. Also gets banned for apparently "communication abuse" when never used chat system. The game needs to fix its report system.

Edit: Finally recieve email 2 weeks late, banned for saying "kys" a few months back but decides to ban months later. That same game my friend flamed the camper killer, gets away scot free. Me: BANNED! People always flame in this game, but if you so ever type kys it doesn't matter what you have not said have said in the past, you get banned.

As a survivor. You spend 50% of the time staring at generators holding mouse button. Other 50% you spam flashlight at the killer and teabag him at the exit so you get points.

As a killer. You feel like fighting against Terminator, Robocop, Superman and Hideo Kojima.
You need to grind 10h to get item that let's you kill someone and it's one time use only.

Ok, to be quite frank, this game's really great, but the community will probably be mad at you for choosing the meta. I enjoy just playing around and trying non-meta builds, but this game involves a lot of grinding. Lots and lots of it. But that's what makes the game fun and the involvement keeps you going day after day. Well, at least I've been doing that.

Ğ˜Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° ĞºÑ€ÑƒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñƒ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ´Ñ‘Ñ‚((((

Must admit I've loved playing dead by daylight. It's hard to stop playing a game that I think has been so funny .... but the killers have now begun to be so overpowered that the survivors have absolutely no chance. The killers are complaining about not beeing able to get any survivors....but maybe the reason is that nobody would like to be survivors atm.

This game is a blast of screams blades and every other thing a horror film or game lover needs. This game for me has it all good reviews solid gameplay that is fun and a bit addicting, you can learn a lot without it being too difficult and the fact that they are putting in the game killers from movies is a very nice touch. Many channels are starting to play this game more and more in my opinion so you can easily find answers for any questions about the game on the internet. Last but not least you can play alone and with friends and still have a great time definetely a 10/10 for me and even though it has some glicthes here and there the devs are doing their best with every patch. (the only real downside is that it takes quite some time to get the perks for the individual charcter you areplaying like agitation for trapper etc)
Very good game :D

The game was good and at time still is. However whenever the killers complain enough the survivers are nerfed, while they (killers) become overpowered. Most recently with the saw chapter, where as a survivers now stand little chance, as the timer was set down/halfed. Before that it was the aures, which means the surviver cannot hide in cabins, as the killers sees us anywhere.

It is sad to see that the programmers give in to complaint, as it lessens the game. It would be a stronger product if the programmers stood their ground and saw in other ways to eqal the score - f.ex base it on rank, so if you are a less experienced killer you get a smaller killing ground, and as you move up so does the maps.

Or maybe even two killers, sis survivers. Alternatives like that
